TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class ConditionalWeakTable<TKey,TValue> where TKey : class where TValue : class
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConditionalWeakTable`2<class TKey, class TValue> extends System.Object
Public NotInheritable Class ConditionalWeakTable(Of TKey, TValue)
generic <typename TKey, typename TValue> where TKey : class where TValue : classpublic ref class ConditionalWeakTable sealed

typeparam.name: TKey
typeparam.span: 欄位所附加至的參考類型。

span.span: The reference type to which the field is attached.
The field's type.
This must be a reference type.

summary.span: 讓編譯器動態地將物件欄位附加至 Managed 物件。

span.span: Enables compilers to dynamically attach object fields to managed objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您附加至 managed 物件的任意數目的屬性，在執行階段的語言編譯器。The class enables language compilers to attach arbitrary properties to managed objects at run time. A物件是一個字典，將受管理的物件，代表依索引鍵，繫結至其附加的屬性，由值。A object is a dictionary that binds a managed object, which is represented by a key, to its attached property, which is represented by a value. 物件的索引鍵是個別的執行個體之`TKey`類別要附加屬性，且其值為屬性值指派給對應的物件。The object's keys are the individual instances of the `TKey` class to which the property is attached, and its values are the property values that are assigned to the corresponding objects. 索引鍵必須是唯一的。換句話說，類別支援一個附加的值，每個受管理的物件。Keys must be unique; in other words, the class supports one attached value per managed object. 兩個索引鍵是否相等，如果將其傳遞至方法會傳回`true`。Two keys are equal if passing them to the method returns `true`. > [!NOTE] > 您無法藉由覆寫控制等號比較明確設定索引鍵的雜湊碼。You cannot control equality comparisons by overriding to explicitly set the hash code for a key. 類別不會使用方法來計算雜湊程式碼，並因此不會叫用會覆寫。The class does not use the method to compute hash codes, and therefore does not invoke overrides. 雖然類別保存索引鍵/值組的集合，它最適合視為資料表，而不是一個字典物件。Although the class holds a collection of key/value pairs, it is best thought of as a table rather than a dictionary object. 類別與字典，以數種方式：The class differs from a dictionary in several ways: - 它不會保存金鑰。It does not persist keys. 也就是索引鍵不會保持作用只是因為它是集合的成員。That is, a key is not kept alive only because it is a member of the collection. - 它不包含所有方法 (例如`GetEnumerator`或`Contains`) 通常具有字典。It does not include all the methods (such as `GetEnumerator` or `Contains`) that a dictionary typically has. - 未實作介面。It does not implement the interface. 不同於其他集合物件，其儲存在集合中的索引鍵的物件存留期的管理中的類別。The class differs from other collection objects in its management of the object lifetime of keys stored in the collection. 一般情況下，當物件儲存在集合中時，其存留期會持續直到移除 （並沒有其他參考的物件） 或集合物件本身終結之前有效。Ordinarily, when an object is stored in a collection, its lifetime lasts until it is removed (and there are no additional references to the object) or until the collection object itself is destroyed. 不過，在類別，加入至資料表的索引鍵/值組不會保證，將會保存金鑰，即使它可以直接從儲存在資料表中 （例如，如果資料表包含一個索引鍵，A 值 V1 值達到與第二個索引鍵，B，P2，其中包含參考的值)。However, in the class, adding a key/value pair to the table does not ensure that the key will persist, even if it can be reached directly from a value stored in the table (for example, if the table contains one key, A, with a value V1, and a second key, B, with a value P2 that contains a reference to A). 相反地，只要不存在其他參考索引鍵資料表外部，就會自動移除的索引鍵/值項目。Instead, automatically removes the key/value entry as soon as no other references to a key exist outside the table. 這個範例將提供說明。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下列範例說明中儲存的金鑰後終結的參考資料表外部資料表不存在。The following example illustrates that a key stored in the table does not persist after references to it outside the table are destroyed. 此範例會定義兩個類別： `ManagedClass`，表示資料表中的索引鍵和`ClassData`，代表索引鍵的值。The example defines two classes: `ManagedClass`, which represents the key in the table, and `ClassData`, which represents the key's value. 此範例會具現化每個類型的三個物件。The example instantiates three objects of each type. 它也會具現化物件，表示第二個`ManagedClass`，再終結第二個`ManagedClass`執行個體。It also instantiates a object that represents the second `ManagedClass`, and then destroys the second `ManagedClass` instance. 嘗試擷取第二個`ManagedClass`物件從屬性會指出沒有物件參考保留。The attempt to retrieve the second `ManagedClass` object from the property indicates that no references to the object remain. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.class/vb/example1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 執行個體類別都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Instances of the class are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 它們不需要呼叫端進行任何額外的鎖定。

span.span: They do not require callers to do any additional locking.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式具現化空資料表; 也就是說，資料表包含沒有索引鍵/值組。The constructor instantiates an empty table; that is, the table contains no key/value pairs. 您可以藉由呼叫加入索引鍵/值組， ，或方法。You can add key/value pairs by calling the , , or method. 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的物件。Every key in a object must be unique. 索引鍵不是唯一都指向相同的物件 (亦即，如果將它們傳遞做為引數方法會傳回`true`)。Keys are not unique if they refer to the same object (that is, if passing them as arguments to the method returns `true`).

param.name: key

span.span: The key to add.

param.span: 索引鍵 代表要附加屬性的物件。

span.span: key represents the object to which the property is attached.
The key's property value.
Adds a key to the table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每個索引鍵必須是唯一的物件。Every key in a object must be unique. 索引鍵不是唯一都指向相同的物件 (亦即，如果將它們傳遞做為引數方法會傳回`true`)。Keys are not unique if they refer to the same object (that is, if passing them as arguments to the method returns `true`). 如果索引鍵被記憶體回收期間加法運算，已移除現有的索引鍵/值組，並會新增新的索引鍵/值組，不會擲回例外狀況。If the key is garbage-collected during the addition operation, the existing key/value pair is removed and the new key/value pair is added without an exception being thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`MainClass`類別和`MainInfo`類別，提供下列相關資訊`MainClass`執行個體。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 此範例會接著呼叫方法，將`MainClass`物件和其附加`MainInfo`物件資料表。The example then calls the method to add a `MainClass` object and its attached `MainInfo` object to a table. 此範例也說明如何呼叫和方法，以將索引鍵/值組加入到資料表，以及方法來擷取現有的索引鍵的值。The example also illustrates calls to the and methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and to the method to retrieve the value of an existing key. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/cs/getvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/vb/getvalue1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 確認釋出資源，並在記憶體回收行程再利用 物件時執行其他清除作業。

span.span: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 記憶體回收行程呼叫準備最終處理而將目前的物件時。The garbage collector calls when the current object is ready to be finalized.

param.name: key

span.span: The key to search for.

summary.span: 以不可分割方式搜尋表格中的指定索引鍵並傳回對應值。

span.span: Atomically searches for a specified key in the table and returns the corresponding value.

summary.span: 如果索引鍵不存在於表格中，則此方法會叫用代表表格值之類別的預設建構函式，以建立繫結至指定索引鍵的值。

span.span: If the key does not exist in the table, the method invokes the default constructor of the class that represents the table's value to create a value that is bound to the specified key.

returns.span: 如果 已存在於表格中，則為對應於 的值；否則為 泛型類型參數定義之類別的預設建構函式所建立的新值。

span.span: The value that corresponds to , if already exists in the table; otherwise, a new value created by the default constructor of the class defined by the generic type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`key`沒有在資料表中，方法會將它，以及藉由呼叫類別所定義的預設建構函式具現化物件`TValue`泛型型別參數。If `key` does not exist in the table, the method adds it, along with the object that is instantiated by calling the default constructor of the class defined by the `TValue` generic type parameter. 如果`TValue`類別具有沒有預設建構函式，就會擲回。If the `TValue` class has no default constructor, a is thrown. 這是擷取現有的值或加入新的值的建議的方法資料表的資料表值的類別定義的預設建構函式。This is the recommended method of retrieving an existing value or adding a new value to the table if the class of the table's value defines a default constructor. 如果沒有定義的預設建構函式，可以改為呼叫方法，依賴提供回呼的方法，來具現化物件，表示資料表的值If it does not define a default constructor, you can instead call the method, which relies on a callback-provided method to instantiate the object representing the table's value 若要擷取現有的索引鍵的值，但不會加入索引鍵/值組，在資料表中，找不到索引鍵時呼叫方法。To retrieve the value of an existing key without adding the key/value pair if the key is not found in the table, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`MainClass`類別和`MainInfo`類別，提供下列相關資訊`MainClass`執行個體。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 範例會呼叫方法，將`MainClass`物件和其附加`MainInfo`物件資料表。The example calls the method to add a `MainClass` object and its attached `MainInfo` object to a table. 此範例也說明如何呼叫和方法，以將索引鍵/值組加入到資料表，以及方法來擷取現有的索引鍵的值。The example also illustrates calls to the and methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and to the method to retrieve the value of an existing key. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/cs/getvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/vb/getvalue1.vb#1)]

para.span: 在[適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或是[可攜式類別庫](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改為攔截基底類別例外狀況 。

span.span: In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, , instead.

span.span: The class that represents the table's value does not define a default constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: public TValue GetValue (TKey key, System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable<TKey,TValue>.CreateValueCallback createValueCallback);
.method public hidebysig instance !TValue GetValue(!TKey key, class System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable`2/CreateValueCallback<!TKey, !TValue> createValueCallback) cil managed
public: TValue GetValue(TKey key, System::Runtime::CompilerServices::ConditionalWeakTable<TKey, TValue>::CreateValueCallback ^ createValueCallback);

param.name: key

span.span: The key to search for.

param.span: 索引鍵 代表要附加屬性的物件。

span.span: key represents the object to which the property is attached.

param.name: createValueCallback
param.span: 方法的委派，可針對指定的 索引鍵 建立值。

span.span: A delegate to a method that can create a value for the given key.

param.span: 它具有類型為 TKey 的單一參數，並且會傳回 TValue 類型的值。

span.span: It has a single parameter of type TKey, and returns a value of type TValue.

summary.span: 以不可分割方式搜尋表格中的指定索引鍵並傳回對應值。

span.span: Atomically searches for a specified key in the table and returns the corresponding value.

summary.span: 如果索引鍵不存在於表格中，則此方法會叫用回呼方法來建立繫結至指定索引鍵的值。

span.span: If the key does not exist in the table, the method invokes a callback method to create a value that is bound to the specified key.

returns.span: 如果 已存在於表格中，則為附加至 的值，否則為 委派所傳回的新值。

span.span: The value attached to , if already exists in the table; otherwise, the new value returned by the delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`key`不存在於表格中，叫用方法所定義`createValueCallback`參數並將其傳遞索引鍵。If `key` does not exist in the table, invokes the method that is defined by the `createValueCallback` parameter and passes it the key. 新的值是資料表中的索引鍵繫結，並且傳回結果。A new value is bound to the key in the table and returned as a result. 表示資料表值的類別未定義預設建構函式時，才使用這個方法。Use this method only when the class that represents the table's value does not define a default constructor. 如果它沒有定義的預設建構函式，使用方法改為。If it does define a default constructor, use the method instead. 若要擷取現有的索引鍵的值，但不會加入索引鍵/值組，在資料表中，找不到索引鍵時呼叫方法。To retrieve the value of an existing key without adding the key/value pair if the key is not found in the table, call the method. 如果多個執行緒嘗試建立相同的金鑰，`createValueCallback`可能會多次叫用具有相同索引鍵。If multiple threads try to create the same key, `createValueCallback` may be invoked multiple times with the same key. 只有其中一個這些呼叫會成功，而且其傳回的值將會加入至資料表。Only one of these calls will succeed, and its returned value will be added to the table. 執行緒成功地建立值皆不明確。Which thread succeeds in creating the value is indeterminate. 此規則允許叫用資料表`createValueCallback`之外的內部資料表鎖定，以防止發生鎖死。This rule permits the table to invoke `createValueCallback` outside the internal table lock to prevent deadlocks. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`MainClass`類別和`MainInfo`類別，提供下列相關資訊`MainClass`執行個體。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 它也會定義靜態 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)`CreateAttachedValue`方法可以指派給委派，並傳遞給方法。It also defines a static (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `CreateAttachedValue` method that can be assigned to the delegate and passed to the method. 範例會呼叫方法，將`MainClass`物件和其附加`MainInfo`物件資料表。The example calls the method to add a `MainClass` object and its attached `MainInfo` object to a table. 此範例也說明如何呼叫和方法，以將索引鍵/值組加入到資料表，以及方法來擷取現有的索引鍵的值。The example also illustrates calls to the and methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and to the method to retrieve the value of an existing key. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/cs/getvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/vb/getvalue1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果索引鍵被記憶體回收這項操作，此方法可能傳回`false`並設定`value`為預設值 （如同索引鍵是不存在）。If the key is garbage-collected during this operation, the method may return `false` and set `value` to the default value (as if the key were not present). ## Examples 下列範例會定義`MainClass`類別和`MainInfo`類別，提供下列相關資訊`MainClass`執行個體。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 範例會呼叫， ，和方法，若要新增至索引鍵/值組資料表。The example calls the , , and methods to add key/value pairs to a table. 在每個案例中，此範例會呼叫方法以確認索引鍵/值組已加入至資料表。In each case, the example calls the method to confirm that the key/value pair has been added to the table. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/cs/getvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/vb/getvalue1.vb#1)]
